description: In the early 90s I made an extensive hypermedia piece called IS VILLAGES which featured a lot of simple word animations I called LETTERMOTORS.  Several months after I debuted the piece at New Coast Writers conference at SUNY Buffalo the piece (which had taken me hundreds of hours to make in hypercard) was lost to a crashed computer and no backup was ever found.  So because I can I made a single new LETTERMOTOR twenty years later
